name: Olympians
desc: This ship was custom-built for the Olympians, the small but elite corporate navy of the Eridani-Utopia Terraforming Corporation. They got their name from Mons Olympus, an enormous volcano on Mars and the site of the original headquarters of the corporation. The ships of the Olympians feature extensive custom upgrades pursuant to their 'quality over quantity' doctrine. Very few examples of these ships remain extant in the Sector - most were destroyed in the chaotic warfare immediately following the Collapse. This particular hull possesses a more efficient shield emitter that reduces damage taken by shields by %s and superior flux systems that improve capacity and dissipation by %s.
